title: Hisense 43inch 43A6100 4K UHD Smart LED TV
description:
4K ULTRA HD

VIDAA U SYSTEM

HDR PLUS

4K UPSCALING

DBX-TV

OPERA TV STORE

NETFLIX UP TO 4K

ULTRA LOCAL DIMMING

PURE BLACK : TRUE WHITE

There are many LEDS in the backlighting setup that can actually make the picture seem brighter than it is, Local Dimming technology adjusts LED lighting to content displayed resulting in darker darks or TRUE BLACK and crisp white or TRUE WHITE.

VIDAA U OS

VIDAA U by Hisense simplifies the traditional smart TV user interface with a one dimensional ribbon design. Now users can fully customise what sources or apps they want to see on a single menu. The VIDAA U platform can detect any connected external devices giving users an intuitive viewing experience thats personal and fast.

SOUND BY DBX-TV : PRO AUDIO

This feature creates the best sound possible from the built-in high-performance speakers. dbx-tvs technology includes Total Sonics, a complete range of audio technologies working together for optimal audio quality; Total Volume, an advanced audio technology that addresses TV viewers biggest complaint unwanted changes in loudness; and Total Surround, which envelops listeners in sound from behind and above using only two TV speaker.

QUAD CORE PROCESSOR

Quick response from the remote, easily switch between sources, video streaming is smooth are a result from the power of the Quad Core processor. With Netflix 4K, YouTube, Icflix and much more on board, enjoy the extra power!

ANYVIEW CAST

Anyview Cast uses your WiFi connection to wirelessly mirror content from your mobile device to your Hisense TV allowing you to share photos, watch TV shows, videos, movies and play games, instantly.

PVR

Pause or record live TV straight onto a USB storage device, without any loss of sound or image quality, using the in-built PVR TV software. Record on a show-by-show basis or use a series link to never miss an episode, and take control over what to watch and when.

HDR PLUS

High Dynamic Range Plus Wide Colour Gamut delivers vibrant and accurate details on screen – expect brighter whites, darker blacks and even more lifelike colour! HDR enabled content via HDMI and on demand opens the door to a whole new viewing experience that’s so realistic!

NETFLIX-ONE BUTTON ACCESS

Netflix is the worlds leading Internet subscription service for enjoying TV shows and movies. Netflix members can instantly stream their favourite TV shows and movies right from their Hisense TV. Get the latest Netflix shows and movies up to 4K Ultra HD resolution, available on select Hisense TV’s! Enjoy Netflix with one button access

WATCH YOUTUBE ON TV

You can use your smartphone, tabletipad to control the YouTube experience on TV. Just make sure your phone, tablet, or computer is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your TV device. explore itenjoy it

HEVC&VP9 DECODING

HEVC (also known as H.265) is the future standard for 4K video decoding. It allows you to stream 4K content over the web or via USB without requiring any other equipment. VP9 capability is essential for viewing 4K content on YouTube.

title: Samsung 48 Inch - Smart LED TV - H6003 - Black
description:
The faster and smarter Samsung H6300 Smart LED TV. An upgraded Smart Hub organizes your content to make finding what you’re looking for easier and more intuitive than ever. This TV is backed by a lightning-fast quad core processor, which reduces lag and accelerates load and smoother navigation.







Full HD 1080p

Experience an amazing picture with no compromises with Samsung 1080p high definition (HD). With a resolution twice as high as standard HD TVs, you can catch all the details of your favorite films and games.







Clear Motion Rate 240

View every detail of action packed movies and sports with Clear Motion Rate 240, an excellent level of motion clarity. The Samsung CMR uses the frame refresh rate, image processor speed and backlight technology to measure fast action.







Wide Color Enhancer Plus

With Wide Color Enhancer Plus, you can enjoy a wider color spectrum and watch movies just like the director intended. You can view enriched colors while watching your favorite movies, and shows, even if it's older, non-HD content.







Smart TV

Explore movies, shows, apps and social media on the intuitive and intelligent Samsung Smart TVs. Browse a new world of TV entertainment quickly and simply with a powerful processor and helpful tools like S Recommendation.







Smart Hub

The interface of the Smart TV Smart Hub organizes your entertainment and content i nto five panels. You can navigate through live TV, movies, streaming content, social networks, and apps from a single location.







Smart Apps

Enjoy a collection of apps for things like sports, movies, social media, television on-demand, interactive games, weather and more. All apps are built specifically for your Smart TV and are available from Samsung Apps.







Screen Mirroring

The screen mirroring feature allows you to mirror your phone or other compatible mobile device's screen onto the TVs screen wirelessly. This feature allows you to use your big screen television instead of your devices smaller screen for showing content, media playback, or other function.







Wi-Fi

With Wi-Fi built right into your TV, it's easy to connect to your existing wireless network. Browse the web and access Samsung Apps or other Smart TV features. Wi-Fi makes it easy to enjoy all types of co ntent on demand.







Full Web Browser

Enjoy everything from online shopping, social media browsing, entertainment news and the latest YouTube hits.







Smart View 2.0

Turn your phone, computer or tablet into a second TV with Smart View 2.0. Whatever is playing on your TV, Netflix, VOD or live TV is streamed to your compatible mobile device as well. This lets you watch your favorite movies, shows and sports all around the house.







DTS Premium Sound

Decoding with DTS Studio Sound™ processing - Delivers immersive 5.1 surround sound from any DTS-encoded content and converts any two-channel audio content into a 5.1 DTS surround sound track for discrete surround sound playback. Experience surround sound with maximum bass response, dialog clarity and consistent volume levels from all your content, including Blu-ray movies, TV programming, streaming and games.




Discover a new reality in Full HD

Enjoy a greater level of home entertainment realism than ever before. Thanks to a resolution twice as high as standard HD TVs, your Samsung FHD TV delivers a breathtaking viewing experience that takes you beyond the screen into a world of total immersion. When you’ve seen the rich and vivid texture of Full HD images, your favorite TV programs and movies will never be the same again. Discover reality with a full high definition experience.







HDMI

Connect your TV and audio systems for higher quality audio and a better entertainment experience when watching your favorite movies, shows and sports. The HDMI connection transmits video and audio over a single cable.







Watch movies from your USB

With ConnectShare Movie, simply plug your USB memory drive or HDD into the TV and instantaneously enjoy movies, photos or music. Now, you can experience a wide variet y of content in the comfort of your living room on your TV.

title: 48 Inch - H5500 - 1920 x 1080 - Full HD LED Smart TV - Black
description:
Bigger Better Experience


 

You want to share something from your mobile with family but the mobile screen is not big enough to watch. The screen mirroring allows you to wirelessly access and share images, videos and music from your mobile, PC, tablet and camera devices to your Smart TV without any sort of hindrance. In that case, if you find your mobile screen small and find it difficult to watch a video, you always have the option of enlarging your screen right away.
















It's HD Now


Your TV watching experience has gone all HD now. Enjoy a much better level of home entertainment realism the way you have always wished for. Thanks to a phenomenal resolution twice as high as standard TVs, your Samsung FHD TV delivers a breathtaking viewing practice that takes you beyond the screen into a world of total immersion. When you have seen the amusing and bright texture of Full HD images, your favorite TV programs and movies will never be the same again. Discover reality with a full high definition experience.















HDMI Connectivity




It is said that a TV without HDMI is like a listening to a cricket match on radio. An HDMI is a good, single-wire, digital audio/video interface essentially required to connect you TV to a digital cable box, satellite box, DVD player, external Blu-ray player, computer,  gaming console, tablet, smartphone or any other device with an HDMI output. This magnificent TV set features HDMI input ports, in order to connect multiple devices simultaneously.

It’s time to say Good-Bye to the FLAT TVs. These extraordinary curves have made the TV watching a new experience. title: 32 Inch - Smart LED TV - CX32U650 - Black (Brand Warranty)
description:
Smart Gets Smarter!

The EcoStar Smart TV experience is now even more powerful, with faster access to Smart features, true multi-tasking and an intuitive interface.

Keeps You Connected to What Matters!

Keeps You Connected to What Matters! Along with quick and smooth operations, Android OS gives you the freedom to browse through millions of applications from Play Store which you can download and install..

Ready & Equipped!

For the ease of our users, EcoStar Smart LED TV is already equipped with more than 40 applications installed including MP3 Quran, Angry Bird, Facebook, Skype, Twitter, Pool Master, Nimbuzz etc.

Entertainment You Need!

Built-in flash memory of 2GB enables you to install games and applications of your own choice from Google Play Store

Fluid Motion for Greater Clarity!

The latest version of EcoStar's Real Color Engine fully digital video processor uses a collection of unique EcoStar algorithms to significantly reduce noise and produce sharp, vibrant, life-like images. EcoStar Real color Engine technology optimizes the color, contrast, detail and clarity of every scene for the exceptional performance.

Plug, Play & Enjoy!

Simply plug your USB device or HDD into your EcoStar TV and instantaneously enjoy 3D content. Now you can experience a wide variety of content in the comfort of your living room.

For Supreme Contrast!

EcoStar’s powerful DynaCon Technology makes your picture clearer and closer to nature. This latest and unique technology increases the dynamic ratio of the black color, giving a depth to the picture.

Enjoy Your Music & Videos Anywhere, Anytime!

Now your compatible EcoStar TV can remotely access files on your PC and smart devices so that you can download music, videos and photos and enjoy them anywhere in your home using the same remote control as your TV.

Hub of Your Entertainment World!

With EcoStar Smart TV you can not only connect to internet through Wifi connectivity but also you can make your TV a Hot Spot for your other wifi enabled devices without the use any rds or cables.

Rich Media Content!

The HTML5 browser allows for media-rich content such as video, live TV and RSS feeds to be easily displayed on the FWD47W802A Pro Bravia with nothing more than a network connection.

Quality Never Goes Out of Style!

Our high quality A+-Grade panel reduces the amount of light scattering in the matrix, which gives IPS its characteristic wide viewing angles and good color reproduction.

Smoother On-Screen Movement!

Whatever you’re watching, you’ll enjoy a silk-smoothing on-screen look in fast moving action sequences with Motion Engine technology.

Superior Picture Quality!

EcoStar HDMI delivers, both, dazzling quality and unmatched ease of use bringing you the HD content without compression during data transmission.

Power Saver!

EcoStar Smart TV uses less than 0.5W standby power for a green and healthy environment to help you cut TV energy consumption and saves on household bills.

Your Own Virtual Private Network!

EcoStar Smart TV can easily help you create protocol configuration which provides users maximum security for their sensitive data online and prevents anyone from recording your Internet surfing habits.

title: 40 Inch - Smart, Full HD LED TV - H5500 - Black
description:
Get a new home entertainment experience with the Samsung H-Series UA40H5500 40 inches Full HD LED TV that displays more vibrant colours using an advanced picture quality improvement algorithm from Samsung and Connect Share which allows you to watch movies directly from USB. Discover unlimited entertainment options with Smart TV Hub. Order for this affordable and great value Samsung Full HD LED TV right here on Daraz.pk at a great price and have it delivered straight to your home or office. 







Full HD Entertainment

Enjoy a greater level of home entertainment realism than ever before. Thanks to a resolution twice as high as standard HD TVs, this Samsung TV delivers a breathtaking viewing experience that takes you beyond the screen into a world of total immersion. When you’ve seen the rich and vivid texture of Full HD images, your favorite TV programs and movies will never be the same again. Discover reality with a full high definition experience.





Rich Vibrant Colours

Using an advanced picture quality improvement algorithm, Samsung’s Wide Color Enhancer Plus drastically improves the quality of any image and uncovers hidden details. See colors as they were meant to be seen with Wide Color Enhancer Plus.



Watch Movies from USB


With ConnectShare Movie, simply plug your USB memory drive or HDD into the TV and instantaneously enjoy movies, photos or music. Now, you can experience a wide variety of content in the comfort of your living room on your TV. All is made easy for you so you can sit back relax and just watch your movies.





Smart TV

Your Samsung Smart TV lets you explore a range of great apps, video clips, TV programs and social posts with Smart Hub. The enhanced Motion Control recognizes even finger movements, so a finger is all it takes to select the channel or volume level, load apps, scroll webpages and navigate Smart Hub.










New Soccer Mode

Soccer Mode sharply and vividly brings out the green grass of the pitch and all the other colours of the stadium. A powerful multi surround sound effect also lets you hear all the excitement. Once you turn on Soccer Mode, it will automatically start recording all action on the TV (HDD required to use PVR). And when there’s a change in sound, like the roar of the crowd’s cheer, or a change in the score, it will know to automatically save the highlights for you to watch later. Play live and recorded matches simultaneously for the ultimate soccer experience at home.What better way to enjoy the remaining World Cup games








Connect your devices

Everyone in the house can watch TV from their different devices wherever they are thanks to Samsung’s latest Smart View 2.0 app. This app makes it easier to enjoy all your content by using your home network. You can stream live broadcast TV content to your smartphone or tablet or connect your phone and use as a TV remote control. It’s easy to use, so all you have to do is enjoy.

title: Samsung 60 Inch - Smart, Full HD LED TV - 60H5100 - Black
description:
Enjoying Smart TV is now easier and faster

Your Samsung Smart TV lets you explore a range of great apps, video clips, TV programs and social posts with Smart Hub.




Updated Smart View connects your TV, devices and content

Samsung’s latest Smart View 2.0 app makes it easier to enjoy all your content however you like. Using your home network, you can stream live broadcast TV content to your smartphone or tablet and use your mobile device as a TV remote control. Or you can access and enjoy content on your Smart TV from your smartphone or PC through Smart Hub's Multimedia Panel. It’s easy to use, so all you have to do is enjoy.





Powerful Quad Core processor for faster performance

Thanks to a powerful Quad Core processor, your Samsung Smart TV offers enhanced performance. You’ll notice the difference straight away, with faster multitasking and switching between content and web browsing, as well as smoother interaction. With this extra power, your entertainment experience will be so much more enjoyable, with less waiting and more viewing.




See your mobile content on a large TV screen quickly and easily

With your new Samsung Smart TV, you can enjoy content from mobile devices on a bigger screen quickly and easily. Samsung’s enhanced screen mirroring technology makes the process simple, with no need to change the TV source. Just open the notification panel on your mobile device, select the Screen Mirrori ng icon and select the TV. That’s all you need to do to enjoy apps, games and more on a full-size TV.




Enjoying Smart TV is now easier and faster

Your Samsung Smart TV lets you explore a range of great apps, video clips, TV programs and social posts with Smart Hub. With enhanced Motion Control recognizes even finger movements, so a finger is all it takes to select the channel or volume level, load apps, scroll webpages and navigate Smart Hub. * Motion Control requires TV camera (sold separately) * Motion control performance varies depending on surrounding environment brightness levels. * Content available via Smart Hub may vary depending on product categories, models and territories.




Discover a new reality in Full HD

Enjoy a greater level of home entertainment realism than ever before. Thanks to a resolution twice as high as standard HD TVs, your Samsung FHD TV delivers a breathtaking viewing experience that takes you beyond the screen into a world of total immersion. When you’ve seen the rich and vivid texture of Full HD images, your favorite TV programs and movies will never be the same again. Discover reality with a full high definition experience.




More vibrant colors for better images

Using an advanced picture quality improvement algorithm, Samsung’s Wide Color Enhancer Plus drastically improves the quality of any image and uncovers hidden details. Now see colors as they were meant to be seen with Wide Color Enhancer Plus.




Watch and listen from USB – ConnectShare™ Movie

The versatile ConnectShare™ Movie USB function lets you connect your USB storage device and enjoy your favourite videos such as MKV, DivxHD and WMV files, photos or music conveniently

description:
The Creative Life

TCL established it operations in Pakistan in 2013 and in 3 years has successfully been able to become one of the leading players in the local industry. Due to its innovative and high quality products and keen attention to customer after sales support, sales volumes have consistently grown year on year. TCL's motto is to give its customers "Affordable Premium Technology" and it's biggest success lies in its high end products. Over the last 3 years, as more and more customers have experienced a TCL TV and its high end technological and smart features, we have witnessed tremendous growth in these products. So much so that recently, TCL has become the one of the top sellers of Smart TV, UHD TV * and 55" category across Pakistan. For a growing brand, this is a huge achievement for TCL and confirms that customers have come to trust it for its technology, quality and affordability.

title: EcoStar 42 3D Smart LED TV (CX-42U900)
description:
Smart Gets Smarter!

The EcoStar Smart TV experience is now even more powerful, with faster access to Smart features, true multi-tasking and an intuitive interface and full 3D experience.

 

 

One Foot Connection!

U900 not only have built in Wi-Fi and RJ45 cable connection for LAN & Internet but it can also perform as a Wi-Fi hotspot. Like if you have cable internet and don't have Wi-Fi router, you can just plug-in the cable and click on hotspot option in the menu and your U900 series shall become a Wi-Fi router and you can connect your laptop, mobile, or other Wi-Fi devices with World Wide Web.

 

 

Say Goodbye to Split Screen!

A unique feature that provides you the facility to watch 2 contents at the same time on your U900 series with special Sync View Glasses (2 pairs) provided for free with each U900 unit.

 

 

Enhance Your Memory!

SD card slot Supports up to 64 GB, provided in U900 series so that you can enhance the memory of your LED TV.

 

 

See the Real Detail!

The realistic detail of Full HD images invites you to enjoy a viewing experience that redefines reality.

 

 

The Ultimate TV Experience!

EcoStar U900 is equipped with Quad Core Processing Unit which enables you to run and manage various applications effortlessly.

 

 

Superior Picture Quality!

EcoStar HDMI delivers, both, dazzling quality and unmatched ease of use bringing you the HD content without compression during data transmission.

 

 

Truly Clearer!

Vibrant colors and exceptional image clarity are hallmarks of the EcoStar TV experience. TruMotion increases the standard which drastically reduces blur and yields crisper details.

 

 

Fluid Motion for Greater Clarity!

The latest version of EcoStar's Real Color Engine fully digital video processor uses a collection of unique EcoStar algorithms to significantly reduce noise and produce sharp, vibrant, life-like images. EcoStar Real color Engine technology optimizes the color, contrast, detail and clarity of every scene for the exceptional performance.

 

 

Say No to Reflections! 

With high contrast ratio, high clarity and low reflection, Reflecto-Con enables more compelling view even in bright viewing surroundings.

 

 

Keeps You Connected to What Matters!

Latest Android 4.2 jelly bean with 4 GB memory and 1 GB DDR3 Ram for quick and smooth operations.

 

 

Hub of Your Entertainment World!

With EcoStar Smart TV you can not only connect to internet through Wifi connectivity but also you can make your TV a Hot Spot for your other wifi enabled devices without the use any rds or cables.

 

 

Share Your Big Screen on Your Smart Phone!

With this unique feature, you can now connect your TV and hand held device with same Wi-Fi router. This is compatible with all Android and IOS devices like tablets and mobiles.

 

 

Turn Your TV Into Your Mobile!

Mobile High Definition link (MHL HDMI) port enables you to connect your smart phones or tablets with your EcoStar U900 Series and the screen of you handheld device is replicated on your TV. Through this option you can play games, movies, pictures, music, etc., on your TV.

 

 

Quality Never Goes Out of Style!

Our high quality A-Grade panel reduces the amount of light scattering in the matrix, which gives IPS its characteristic wide viewing angles and good color reproduction.

 

 

It's Not Just a TV!

Connecting your PC to your TV has become an extremely popular requirement these, especially with the growth of video streaming. EcoStar TV lets you access your laptops or personal computers on to a big screen via HDMI or VGA or for sharing memory DLNA for an extravagant experience.

 

 

It's Easy toKeep in Touch!

Making Skype calls on your TV is easy. With our built-in camera, you can video chat with your friends and family in the comfort of your living room.

 

 

Smoother On-Screen Movement!

Whatever you’re watching, you’ll enjoy a silk-smoothing on-screen look in fast moving action sequences with Motion Engine technology.

 

 

Picture Perfect!

Witness the entire RGB spectrum brought to life on your screen to bring you exceptionally vibrant, yet natural-looking images faithful to the director's original intent.

 

 

For Supreme Contrast!

EcoStar’s powerful DynaCon Technology makes your picture clearer and closer to nature. This latest and unique technology increases the dynamic ratio of the black color, giving a depth to the picture.
